attributes.action: STOP SHOWING  T.V. ADVERTS FOR TOYS/GAMES ON CHILDRENS PROGRAMS
attributes.additional_details:
Children today are bombarded with T.V. adverts,collect this card,get this toy,play this game,go for a happy meal, (meal o.k. BUT IT'S THE TOY, again)
   We all love are Children/Grandchildren and I'ts hard to compete with the constant BUY THIS, EAT HEAR, PLAY THIS..
 PLEASE SIGN UP and ask your F/Book, Twitter and  people you speak to, to signup
